column5: So I'm tired of standing in the wind so this year I"m building a shack 6x8 6Ft wall outta 2x2s and 3/8 plywood anyone got any ideas on construction Not looking for fancy just warm
GBW   Can you send me those plans as well... please and thank you.
Thanks for the link Just checked it out and seems to have what I"m looking for
Done, check your PM  No prob.
on a side note... whats the largest portable hut you can make ?? im sure there's a limit.
General Enquiries Natural Resources Information Centre 1-800-667-1940

One thing to keep in mind, which at least half of all builders of huts I've been in did not, is to place your windows low enough so that you can look at your outside lines while sitting down.  Having to stand up every two minutes to see if your flag is up is a pain...you should be able to sit there in front of your inside hole, jigging away and just tilt your head up and get a perfect view of your outside tip-up or whatever.

A friend of mine used plans for a shed from H/D.and added low windows.2x3s and plwood.He also coated the base with fibregrass powder and resin mixture for extra protection on the plywood floors.Way to heavy for my liking.
can u send me them plans also thanks im looken for the samething something to keep warm in and take kids too
